data.title: Obituary of Michael Dennis Bell
data.meta_description: Michael Dennis Bell, 63 of Minneapolis, MN died on Tuesday December 21, 2021. Mike was born in St. Paul, MN and lived in several cities in southern M
data.text: Michael Dennis Bell, 63 of Minneapolis, MN died on Tuesday December 21, 2021. Mike was born in St. Paul, MN and lived in several cities in southern Minnesota along with stays in Wisconsin and Michigan before settling in Minneapolis. Mike was a journeyman Chef who started in the family restaurant and had over 40 years working in some of the finest restaurants in the Midwest including Manny’s Steakhouse and International Market Square. Mike was a hockey player and golfer that enjoyed all Minnesota sports teams and loved music and camping. Above all he was a family man who was married for over 40 years to his wife Andrea and dearly loved his children. Mike was preceded in death by his son’s Kyle Bell and Mike Bell as well as his brother Terry. He is survived by his wife Andrea, daughter Stephanie, step-daughter Sarah, grandchildren, and brothers and sisters. A gathering will be held at Cremation Society of Minnesota, 4343 Nicollet Ave, Minneapolis, MN 55409 on January 14th at 1:00PM.
